__e: In this city, the fog is man's best friend.
Do you have any idea what it's been like since that fog went up?
If the shroud is still up, you shouldn't even remember me.
Fellow Germans! I have come to you for only a few hours, to evoke in your midst the memory of a day FOG!
Uh, guys... the fog that was outside, now it's inside.
You mean, that fog all around us?
One night when I was lost in a fog, I was glad to get my feet on the ground. What do you think the "welcome home" speech was?
It's foggy as hell outside. Anyway, I can't see far.
There's no night, there's no day, it's just one big fucking blur and it don't count for nothing.
- But you have, there are still tears in your eyes.
I-I felt like I'd been asleep for years, in this fog of grief, and then there's this person who makes me feel alive, and it...
I got to admit, now that my mind is no longer lost in the fog of love, it's starting to make sense.

It is said that since that day she lives inside the lagoon and when the sky is gloomy and the fog apppears it means that Erèndira will come out to search for a bad man one of those who don't know to court a woman with nice words.
Looks like the fog's gonna lift and that boat'll be sailin'.
